title: ChatGPT-Enabled English Learning Strategies: UTAUT Model-Based Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced English proficiency (CEFR B2+), basic smartphone functionality comprehension
context.additional_context: An English learning course conducted in a limited-technology environment using smartphones. Learners aim to improve practical English skills based on workplace experiences.

learning_goals: Learners generate and revise situational English dialogues using the ChatGPT interface.
The UTAUT model elements (performance expectancy, effort expectancy, social influence, and perceived enjoyment) can be applied to analyze English learning motivation.
A smartphone-based ChatGPT tool can be used to perform business English email writing and proofreading processes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
